title: Executive Order 10541-Further Extension of the Existence of Quetico-Superior Committee
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States, the existence of the Quetico-Superior Committee. which was created by Executive Order No. 6783 of June 30, 1934, and the existence of which has been extended from time to time, the last extension being made to June 30, 1954, by Executive Order No. 10134 of June 28, 1950, is hereby further extended for a period of four years from June 30, 1954, to June 30, 1958.
citation: Dwight D. Eisenhower, Executive Order 10541-Further Extension of the Existence of Quetico-Superior Committee Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/307046
